sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SAUL the ſon of Kiſh, of the tribe of Benjamin, was the firſt king of the Iſraelſtes. On account of his diſobedient conduct, the kingdom was taken from his family, and given to David. See the Firſt Book of Samuel.
Saul, otherwiſe called Paul. See Paul.
